docs.title: About
docs.text:
Hi my name is Nicholas Doglio! (He/Him)

I am a Software Engineer based in NY currently working on the Mobile Application Platform team at Zillow (Previously at Nextdoor, Vimeo and Verizon Wireless). As an engineer I'm passionate about building tooling to maximize developer productivity, dependency injection and design systems.
